meanings.definition: The act of adding color to something.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy coloring in my coloring book.
meanings.sent2: The coloring of the rainbow was beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried coloring on the walls with its paws.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter added a splash of coloring to the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist's coloring of the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The way in which something is colored or appears in terms of color.
meanings.sent1: The coloring of the flowers in the garden was vibrant.
meanings.sent2: She admired the coloring of the butterfly's wings.
meanings.sent3: The clown's colorful wig added to his already bright coloring.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline had a unique coloring against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The coloring of the dress made her stand out in the crowd.
